data.author: Adrian...415
data.title: One of the best apps but…
data.content: It saves sonic headache of having to manually divide up restaurant items buttttt I wish you can connect to Venmo. It has the option but it’s stuck on the Authorizing App screen:/ Besides that, great app

data.author: 3E-V
data.title: Amazing!!
data.content: Great app!! You should consider an option for splitting regular receipts like for Costco where it lists out the discounts per item nor just batched discount at the end
